sentence.Network_en: This Utopian dream is far beyond the range of possibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种乌托邦式的梦想根本不可能实现.

entry.tran: （计划、想法）空想的，不切实际的
entry.def: If you describe a plan or idea as utopian, you are criticizing it because it is unrealistic and shows a belief that things can be improved much more than is possible.

example.ex: He was pursuing a utopian dream of world prosperity...
example.tran: 他怀揣着一个实现世界繁荣的乌托邦之梦。

example.ex: A complete absence of national border controls is as utopian today as the vision of world government.
example.tran: 在今天，完全取消国家边界控制的观点与建立一个世界政府的想法一样不切实际。

entry.tran: （政治或宗教思想）空想的，乌托邦式的
entry.def: Utopian is used to describe political or religious philosophies which claim that it is possible to build a new and perfect society in which everyone is happy.

example.ex: His was a utopian vision of nature in its purest form.
example.tran: 他对大自然怀有一种极为纯粹的乌托邦式看法。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by or aspiring to impracticable perfection;

sentences.sentence: "recognized the utopian nature of his hopes"

auth_sentence.content: The result is an angular, utopian soundscape.

auth_sentence.content: "I'm not a utopian thinker," Klein says.

sentences.en: the great utopian dream that they have cherished for so long
sentences.cn: 他们长期抱有的伟大的乌托邦式的梦想

means.word_mean: 空想的社会主义者;空想家

sentences.en: His ideas on equality are viewed as utopian in the current political climate.
sentences.cn: 在当前的政治气候下，他关于平等的观点被认为是乌托邦。
